summary: Comprehensive dataset covering input and output index series
description: Comprehensive dataset covering input and output index series. Price movement data at all manufacturing, aggregated industry and product group level. Data supplied from individual UK manufacturers, importers and exporters.
title: Producer Prices Inflation
